text: is an old province in the area of Fukushima Prefecture on the island of Honshū.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Iwashiro" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 410. It was sometimes called .Murdoch, James. (1903). A History of Japan, Vol. 3. p. 794. The history of the province started in 1868 and ended in 1872. ==History== In the Meiji period, the provinces of Japan were converted into prefectures. The maps of Japan and Iashiro Province were reformed in the 1870s.Nussbaum, "Provinces and prefectures" at p. 780. ==Related pages== * Provinces of Japan * Prefectures of Japan * List of regions of Japan * List of islands of Japan * Sanriku ==References== ==Other websites == * Murdoch's map of provinces, 1903 Category:Former provinces of Japan Category:Fukushima Prefecture
title: Iwashiro Province
